title: Nation-wide curfew in effect until 7 AM on Tuesday (10)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Nation-wide Curfew has been imposed with effect from 7 PM tonight (9) to 7 AM on Tuesday (10), said the President’s Media Division.
BASL assures legal action against those who incited violence; Urged public to remain calm
Ruling Party MP Amarakeerthi Athukorala Killed In Clashes; Several properties vandalized
